summary: Twelve spells that give the player the ability to cast webs
descriptionHtml:
This is a set of twelve web spells: six strengths of two spells, Web Bolt, and Web Stream.

I think they are balanced, they just cover the target in webbing paralyzing them for a short time.

To get them bring up the console, type Help WebShot or Help WebStream to bring up the relevent ID, then type player.addspell [ID] for each spell. You know how to do this by now I'm sure.

Simple as that. I used the CK so no mods, scripts, fancy pants, or anything else is used or needed. Just add them to your character and away you go.

Enjoy them people, and if anyone wants to use them in their own mods you are more than welcome, just give credit where credit is due.

Cheers.

Jason Mackinnon

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Update:

I change some of the visual effects so now you get a splash of webbing and all caught within are webbed. I also changed the cost of casting them to be more acceptable.

Basically they all do web and paralyze anyone caught in them for a duration depending on the spell.
author: Jason Mackinnon
